name: Run Giraffe!
description:
Run Giraffe! Description

A game about a giraffe with a neck that grows when a fruit is eated, while trying to avoid the lions. Inspired by oh my giraffe.

How to play
  1. Click on the screen to start playing.
  2. Giraffe's head looks at your mouse.
  3. Click with left mouse button to eat a fruit, this will increase your neck size.
  4. Click with right mouse button to drop the fruit, and if it hits a lion, he dies.
  5. Don't let Giraffe's neck be too small, except if you want to see she exploding. Avoid lions and don't spend too much time looking for fruits, eat them!
  6. At night lions sleep, so you don't have to think about them. You can kill them while they sleep, if you need to...
Why?

I made this game with the purpose of learning Godot. I'm making a few more small projects like this one before I start making serious games. And yes, I don't know how to make pixel-art. Also, I'm using only the PICO-8 palette in my pixel-art.

Hope you have fun, at least. Give feedback, please!

Credits
